Software / DevOps Developer, Blogger, Parent, Host

3.1415926535.., also known as Pi, is an active user on a number of LINE Open Chat and Discord.

Pi is part of a community that facilitates online English speaking practices and runs a couple English based channel on software development and working aboard.

6 things about me:

  • Graduated from RMIT and based in Melbourne, Australia.
  • Worked in software companies over 7 years.
  • Temporarily resides in Taiwan. Return date TBD.
  • Prefer keyboard over mouse, command line and keyboard shortcuts over GUI.
  • Married to a tech guy with two spawns.
  • Gender identified as female.
